entry.def: Tidal means relating to or produced by tides.

example.ex: The tidal stream or current gradually decreases in the shallows...
example.tran: 浅滩上的潮水逐渐退去。

example.ex: The 20-minute boat ride through a maze of tidal rivers and marshes is wonderful.
example.tran: 在迂回曲折、潮水汹涌的河流和沼泽地中航行20分钟的感觉真是美妙。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or caused by tides;

auth_sentence.content: Wave and tidal power can offer predictable generation too.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wave and tidal power can offer predictable generation too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wave and tidal power can offer predictable generation too.

auth_sentence.content: My hoppocampus has some tidal waves sloshing around in there.
auth_sentence.res_content: My hoppocampus has some tidal waves sloshing around in there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My hoppocampus has some tidal waves sloshing around in there.

auth_sentence.content: The street smelled of low tide in a tidal swamp.
auth_sentence.res_content: The street smelled of low tide in a tidal swamp.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The street smelled of low tide in a tidal swamp.
